resources.string:
You are controlling the tribble, your task is to eat as much food that appears on field as you can. Getting bigger the tribble's going to reproduct itself so you're gonna get rivals, and there won't be enough food for all. You must eat it and prevent your hungry death. 
Controls: touch a left part of the screen to rotate tribble's moving counterclockwise and right part to clockwise. 
The game is based upon a Star Trek created by Gene Roddenberry. 
Tribbles created by David Gerrold

 Created by: Vasiliy Dzubenko
 Concept by: Vadim Litvinenko
 Edited by: Ivan Rogozhin
